Class Pool

extends java.lang.Object
    class handling connection pooling

    suriya

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(int min,
                              int max)
        Initialization of the connection pooling static class
        Parameters:
        min - number of connection at least available at the beginning
        max - maximum number of connection that can be used in parallel
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • checkAvailableConnection

        public static boolean checkAvailableConnection()
                                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Check if there's a connection available in the pool
        Returns:
        boolean return true if there is at least one Connection available, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getConnection

        public static java.sql.Connection getConnection()
                                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Return a connection from pool
        Returns:
        Connection if there is one available, return null otherwise
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • release

        public static void release(java.sql.Connection c)
        Return a connection to the pool
        Parameters:
        c - The connection to return to the pool

      • closeAll

        public static void closeAll()
        Close all connections in the pool
